title: Bio-inspired interfacial chemistry for the fabrication of a robust and functional graphene oxide composite film
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7676-7683
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08932K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yoo-Bin Kwon, Seongwon Cho, Dal-Hee Min, Young-Kwan Kim
A strong and functional artificial nacre film is developed by using polyethyleneimine-functionalized GO (PEI-GO) and pyrogallol (PG) inspired by insect exoskeleton sclerotization.
